# License Plate Generator

This is a Next.js/React/TypeScript project for generating EU license plates as images.

## Features
- Generate EU license plates (German plates primarily)
- Add German state plakette (Landeswappen) and HU plakette (TÃœV sticker)
- Custom EuroPlate font for authentic appearance
- Large preview in the UI
- PNG export at 420x100-200px
- Selectable width: compact or standard (520mm)

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- React 18+
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- The app will be available at http://localhost:3000
